history.narrative: Law 4-122 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-419, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 1982, and April 27, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 11, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-187 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
